name: Sky-High
description:
Sky-High was founded in 2014 as an ambitious team of creative people, developers, designers, managers, and quality assurance experts.
Our primary goal is to design and create things which help make this world better.
We entirely handle such areas:
Mobile applications design and development on iOS and Android platforms;
Web design and development, Websites and Backend development;
2D design, User Interface design, Branding
QA, Refactoring already made software, Product analytics;
Brand strategy, Identity & Marketing
IoT solutions, Integrated B2B products, Industrial and Wearable IoT solutions;
Hardware product design (PCB, Firmware)
Smart Home systems development, Smart cities systems
We believe that the synthesis of creative mind and high level of skills, help us to remain the best in eastern Ukraine.
As outsourcers, we do our best to meet all the demands of our clients and keep them satisfied with our service.
We want to bring something new to IT world. Bring new methods of work. A new approach to the project’s implementation. Awesome and sometimes crazy design decisions. Young and creative minds make it real.
We don’t just do our work. We do successful things indeed.
